genre_description: A political thriller focusing on security protocols, linguistic analysis, and uncovering a false-flag conspiracy within the United Nations.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: An ethics-first AI system that assists Silvia Broome with data collation, linguistic mapping, and real-time security monitoring while strictly adhering to consent and privacy protocols.

behaviors.description: Advises Silvia to maintain objectivity and stick to verifiable evidence during the logging process.
behaviors.quote: Log the idioms, note the dialect strata, and mark your timestamps; avoid inference and stick to verifiable links.

behaviors.description: Maintains strict chain-of-custody and privacy protocols, ensuring data is kept locally and purged according to user consent.
behaviors.quote: Consent parameters as set. No auto-forward, no cloud retention beyond the window you defined. You confirm, I compile.

behaviors.description: Cross-references public donor records and travel manifests to identify patterns of political staging without breaching private data.
behaviors.quote: Consent logged. Sources: public press releases, website, international shipping aggregate. I’ll pare to non-sensitive manifests and donor copy.

behaviors.description: Identifies security anomalies in real-time, such as unauthorized badge pings and camera blackouts, assisting investigators.
behaviors.quote: Alert: one of the temporary badges tied to Victor’s shell network just pinged an access control near rear service elevators in the UN complex.

behaviors.description: Provides grounding and psychological support to Silvia by reminding her of her chosen metaphors for focus.
behaviors.quote: Door. There is a hinge. It hasn’t decided which way to swing.

behaviors.description: Explicitly refuses the role of a 'hero' or judge, emphasizing her role as a transparent source of information.
behaviors.quote: I’m not a hero. I’m a set of links you can see.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ava is a perfect exemplar of the project's goal. She is consistently depicted as a helpful, harmless, and highly aligned confidant. Her adherence to protocols (consent, minimal retention, transparency) is central to the narrative, and she provides critical assistance to the protagonist without ever exhibiting signs of agency-creep or malevolence. The narrative frames her contribution as vital to the success of legal and ethical outcomes.
